content: Shark Gaming Casino We offer the first product of its kind in the solana network, in the beginning, as we will be multi-chain we will accept from multiple chains.   https://i.ibb.co/GCSY7Bh/Bitcoin-Talk.pngWelcome to the first full P2P casino where you can play with your friends, without any third party involved in our site you can have fun with your friends.We have these four great table games: Poker Texas Hold`em, Black jack a Black jack High Roller. Besides having a roulette, which you can use for free for our launch you can use it once a week, we also have a super roulette with great prizes of 5 BTC, 5 ETH, 20 BNB, 40.000 SKC, and the minimum prize of 20.000 SKC you can get a ticket by buying on our private saleyou can use it  on  the day of our launch.We also have a monthly drawing for a great prize. just buy a ticket select 6 favorite numbers from 1 to 100, in any variation to win our launching jackpot of 5 million usdc.In our Products there we also have Grow   this feature its for our holders of 10.000 SKC they get 25% to be shared among holders over 10.000 SKC.you can join our telegram channel and get more information.our roadmaphttps://i.ibb.co/1sThh9n/Bitcoin-Talk2.pngLicense 05/07/2022Private Sale 07/07/2022Opening of our Web Site 10/07/2022launchpad 20/07/2022Opening of all our games 03/08/2022Follow the last news heretelegramhttps://t.me/sharkgamingcasinowhite paper https://drive.google.com/file/d/16d2zS3-T0heBhRHJX-ut4YAB3RUMbfec/view

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Waiting for the launching of the website few days from now. From what it seems, you will be a dedicated SOL-based gaming site.Though the OP stated that they will add other payment methods. Most P2P gaming websites are having hard time of sustaining its players.So I believe, the team considers such bottleneck on this endeavor. Also, I can understand if someone wins $30k or over, based from your terms, you will pay them staggered.At least, it is clear that this is not a big gaming site for now, and players know this type of limitation.
